title: Inside Magoo
creator_credit: United Productions of America, American Cancer Society, Stephen Bosustow and John F. Becker
brief_description: A highly entertaining and informative educational film combining both animation and live-action explaining the seven danger signals of cancer. Underlines the importance of regular medical check-ups to guard your health. Stresses the need for early diagnosis before cancer has spread throughout the body. Featuring Jim Backus in the role of Mr Magoo.
